Elite AI Advisory Test Document

Business Plan Summary
===================

Company: Test Startup Inc.
Founded: 2024
Industry: SaaS / B2B Technology

Executive Summary:
Test Startup Inc. provides innovative AI-powered solutions for small to medium-sized businesses.
Our platform helps companies automate their business operations and improve decision-making.

Market Opportunity:
- Total Addressable Market: $50B
- Target Customer: SMBs with 10-500 employees
- Initial Focus: North America

Revenue Model:
- Subscription-based (SaaS)
- Three tiers: Starter ($99/mo), Growth ($299/mo), Enterprise ($999/mo)

Financial Projections:
Year 1: $500K ARR
Year 2: $2M ARR
Year 3: $5M ARR

Team:
- CEO: Jane Doe (Former VP at TechCorp)
- CTO: John Smith (15 years engineering experience)
- CMO: Sarah Johnson (Growth expert from StartupCo)

Funding:
Seeking $2M seed round to scale product and team.
